recommended_degree: Manajemen, Manajemen Bisnis, Administrasi Niaga, Administrasi Bisnis, Bisnis (Sarjana)
job_description:
1. Assisted in researching Key Opinion Leader (KOL) based on each platform and brand needs to match the target audience.

2. Supported the selection and administrative data management of Key Opinion Leader (KOL).

3. Helped monitor campaign timelines, from dealing and storyline development to drafting and posting.

4. Assisted in compiling Key Opinion Leader (KOL) content performance recaps for each brand (views, likes, comments, shares, etc.).

5. Supported the creation of simple Key Opinion Leader (KOL) campaign reports (KOL insights).

6. Participated in content ideation and campaign brainstorming sessions with the team.
